summary: Adds a follower to your game called clement.... he is fully equipped with deadric armour and can use unrelenting force!
descriptionHtml:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CYxb06tCZzM&feature=youtu.be



hey guys, this is my second mod i have made and this 1 is simply a follower.

you can find clement in the sleeping giant in (usually using the enchanter.. god knows why)

he has full deadric armour and he has a sword in his inventory which is good for anyone going to riverwood after helgen...

oh and he can shout! as ive seen there isnt many followers that can shout but clement can, he uses the greybeards unrelenting force and has all 3 words, usually sends most enemies flying!

hope you enjoy this simple yet good follower as he is very chatty and tends to well.... chat aload of shite when travelling.. entertaining though haha :)
author: triforce96
